txt.en: DNT stroll around the grounds. look at the waystones
Find the overlook beneath the arches

Lady Vanyalos listens intently as you describe your exploration of her city. When you are finished, she sighs happily.\n\n'Thank you, [placeholder]. I think I will sleep now, and perhaps I shall dream of the places you have described to me. I am quite transported, in time if not in place, to the years of my youth, when I saw those sights beneath sun-filled skies, with a sun-lit heart.'
DNT Q15 - Walkabout
Find the central fountain
DNT scenes discovered ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Find the Erui overlook, south-east of the Hall of the Gentle Hand

'While you tread the paths of Imloth Melui, do not keep your eyes upon your feet! These fair arbors and gardens recall the grandeur of my kingdom's past. I have walked them many times since my youth, and to remember them is the sweetest respite.\n\n'I ask  you to take note of the loveliest sights you see here. When you return to me, you may recount them and so I will relive the pleasures I knew, through your fresh eyes.'
Find the shaded path that overlooks the River Erui
Lady Vanyalos is in her hall on the north-east rise of Imloth Melui, waiting for you to return with descriptions of her city.
An ancient tower looks down on the flowering trees that ring the central fountain.
Find the bridge by the source of the Erui, north-west of Imloth Melui
Clear water laughs loudly as it spills into the central fountain. Ancient arches peer from behind flower-laden trees.
DNT found a path marker ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Sights discovered ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Return to Lady Vanyalos in her hall
DNT scenes discovered ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Sights of Gondor's Garden
DNT path markers found ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT stroll around the grounds. look at the waystones
DNT that is well. I think you.
Lady Vanyalos insists that the gardens and arbors of Imloth Melui recall the grandeur of Gondor in its youth, and wants you to remind her of their varied beauties.
DNT path markers found ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Lady Vanyalos has asked you to appreciate the many beautiful sights within Imloth Melui.
DNT return to lady vanyalos
It is cool in the shaded path and branches of the pines seem to whisper of things long forgotten.
Here the River Erui courses widely through great arches, crashing in a great fall on its journey south.
Old Gondorian stone sits nestled among the rocky crags and green and flowering boughs.
DNT Talk to Vanyalos
DNT path markers found ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Where the Erui comes down from the mountains in great cascades, noise and peacefulness blend into one.
Blossom, river, and stonework alike are watched over by slope-side ranks of mountain pine.
DNT found a spot
DNT found another spot
Here the River Erui courses widely through great arches, crashing in a great fall on its journey south.
DNT found a third spot
Old Gondorian stone sits nestled among the rock crags and green and flowering boughs.
DNT found yet another spot
